past_001.description: Prehistoric era - early human connection to nature, community, and truth.
past_001.what_was: Human connection to nature, community living, truth-telling through art and story.
past_001.what_is: Foundation of human truth - connection to nature, community, and spiritual expression.
past_001.what_must_become: Return to connection with nature, community, and truth. Foundation for future alignment.

past_002.description: Ancient civilizations - stewardship, precision, spiritual alignment, community effort.
past_002.what_was: Stewardship through architecture, precision in craft, spiritual alignment, community effort for collective purpose.
past_002.what_is: Examples of stewardship, precision, and spiritual alignment. Community effort for collective purpose.
past_002.what_must_become: Return to stewardship, precision, and spiritual alignment. Community effort for collective purpose.

pres_001.description: Present moment - separation, misalignment, transition, return to truth.
pres_001.what_was: Separation from The Table, misalignment, systems built on separation, exploitation, and control.
pres_001.what_is: Transition happening. Return to truth beginning. Systems transforming. Community awakening.
pres_001.what_must_become: Complete return to The Table. Full alignment. Systems transformed. Community unified. Truth restored.

fut_001.description: Transition period - healing, transformation, system change, community unity.
fut_001.what_is: Transition happening. Healing occurring. Systems transforming. Community uniting.
fut_001.what_must_become: Full alignment. Complete healing. Systems transformed. Community unified. Truth restored.

fut_002.description: Future aligned with The Table - peace, unity, truth, stewardship, community.
fut_002.what_was: Separation, misalignment, damage, systems of separation.
fut_002.what_is: Full alignment with The Table. Peace, unity, truth, stewardship, community.
fut_002.what_must_become: Eternal alignment. Complete truth. Full peace. Perfect unity. Total stewardship. Complete community.
